sources.name: NullsRemovedCaseData
sources.script:
source(output(
		Store_nbr as short,
		StrType as string,
		OpenDate as date,
		gregorian_date as date,
		Cases as short,
		Sales as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> NullsRemovedCaseData

sinks.name: SaveSalesAfterOpenCSV
sinks.script:
SalesAfterOpen sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['salesAfterOpen.csv'],
	truncate:true) ~> SaveSalesAfterOpenCSV
